Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 27 Mar 2019Follow the rules of thumb.Upgraded Medishield Life
10 X of your Annual Income as coverage in the event of death and permanent disability. 
5 X of your Annual Income as income protection due to illness. 
Save 20% of your income for retirement. 
And once you have kids, 5% for their education. Next is to find an advisor that can help you understand why they're required and has your interests at heart.
